name: Attach3DTextLabelToVehicle
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Attaches a 3D Text Label to a specific vehicle.

params_body.name: Text3D:id
params_body.description: The 3D Text Label you want to attach.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The vehicle you want to attach the 3D Text Label to.

params_body.name: OffsetX
params_body.description: The Offset-X coordinate of the player vehicle (the vehicle is 0.0,0.0,0.0)..

params_body.name: OffsetY
params_body.description: The Offset-Y coordinate of the player vehicle (the vehicle is 0.0,0.0,0.0)..

params_body.name: OffsetZ
params_body.description: The Offset-Z coordinate of the player vehicle (the vehicle is 0.0,0.0,0.0)..

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
